column1: Uchi////Uchi is a Japanese-inspired restaurant. When eating sushi
column2: one orders in small doses (to make sure the ingredients are freshly eaten
column3: to cleanse the pallet between bites
column4: to give the chef time). Each dose has a bunch of flavors
column9: and all one need do is make sure to eat them all as intended (typically: all the flavors at once).
